enb_long_title: Thirteenth Session of the Subsidiary Bodies of the UNFCCC
sentences: Some observers expressed concern Thursday regarding the process used in formulating and presenting some conclusions and decisions in the contact groups.
They alleged that some text that had not been discussed previously was 'slipped in surreptitiously,' while in other cases Parties' submissions appeared to have been 'conveniently ignored.
' However, others noted that it was an arduous task to cope with the various group texts and proposals emerging.
